about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Founded over 15 years ago in Niter√≥i, Kerotur was born from the dream of turning travels into unforgettable experiences. We started our journey as a small family agency and, with dedication and passion for tourism, became a reference in Rio de Janeiro.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to provide unique moments to our clients, offering personalized packages, humanized service, and the best national and international destinations. We believe that every trip is a story waiting to be lived.
about.paragraph3: With an experienced team passionate about travel, Kerotur is proud to have taken thousands of families to their dream destinations. Whether it's an international adventure or a regional tour, we're here to make your trip perfect from start to finish.
